com.citytechinc.cq.component.annotations.widgets

Annotation Type Html5SmartImage


  • @Retention(value=CLASS)
@Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
public @interface Html5SmartImage
    CQ.html5.form.SmartImage

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean allowCrop
      Method to turn on cropping and automatically set the cropParameter; this simplifies cropParameter()
      boolean allowMap
      Method to turn on mapping and automatically set the mapParameter; this simplifies mapParameter()
      boolean allowRotate
      Method to turn on rotating and automatically set the rotateParameter; this simplifies rotateParameter()
      boolean allowUpload
      Flag if uploading a file is allowed
      AspectRatio[] cropAspectRatios
      Crop Config Aspect Ratios
      String cropParameter
      Deprecated. 
      use allowCrop() to automatically to set the value to what CQ expects
      String[] ddGroups
      Groups involved in drag & drop
      boolean disableFlush
      True to not render the flush button.
      boolean disableInfo
      True to hide the "information" tool
      boolean disableZoom
      True to not render the zoom slider
      String fileNameParameter
      Name of the form field used for posting the file name.
      String fileReferenceParameter
      Name of the form field used for posting the file reference.
      int height
      Height of the SmartImage component.
      String mapParameter
      Deprecated. 
      use allowMap() to automatically to set the value to what CQ expects
      String name
      The field's HTML name attribute
      String rotateParameter
      Deprecated. 
      use allowRotate() to automatically to set the value to what CQ expects
      boolean tab
      Indication of whether the HTML5 Smart Image Widget should be rendered as a stand alone tab.
      String uploadUrl
      Path to which files will be uploaded.

    • Element Detail

      • disableFlush

        public abstract boolean disableFlush
        True to not render the flush button.
        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        false

      • disableInfo

        public abstract boolean disableInfo
        True to hide the "information" tool
        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        false

      • disableZoom

        public abstract boolean disableZoom
        True to not render the zoom slider
        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        false

      • cropParameter

        @Deprecated
public abstract String cropParameter
        Deprecated. use allowCrop() to automatically to set the value to what CQ expects
        Name of the form field used for posting the cropping rect; use null or a zero-length String if the cropping tool should be disabled; the value should always be "./imageCrop" for CQ
        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        ""

      • fileNameParameter

        public abstract String fileNameParameter
        Name of the form field used for posting the file name. Be aware that you will have to specify a suitable value here, as there is no sensible default value available. Suitable values are dependant on their serverside counterpart and must be "./fileName" for CQ foundation's image and download components; use "./image/fileName" for the textimage component.
        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        "fileName"

      • fileReferenceParameter

        public abstract String fileReferenceParameter
        Name of the form field used for posting the file reference. Be aware that you will have to specify a suitable value here, as there is no sensible default value available. Suitable values are dependant on their serverside counterpart and must be "./fileReference" for CQ foundation's image and download components; use "./image/fileReference" for the textimage component.
        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        "fileReference"

      • name

        public abstract String name
        The field's HTML name attribute
        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        ""

      • mapParameter

        @Deprecated
public abstract String mapParameter
        Deprecated. use allowMap() to automatically to set the value to what CQ expects
        Name of the form field used for posting the image map data; use null or a zero-length String if the image mapping tool should be disabled; the value deshould always be "./imageMap" for CQ
        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        ""

      • rotateParameter

        @Deprecated
public abstract String rotateParameter
        Deprecated. use allowRotate() to automatically to set the value to what CQ expects
        Name of the form field used for posting the rotation angle; use null or a zero-length String if the rotate tool should be disabled; The value should always be "imageRotate" for CQ
        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        ""

      • uploadUrl

        public abstract String uploadUrl
        Path to which files will be uploaded.
        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        "/tmp/upload/*"

      • ddGroups

        public abstract String[] ddGroups
        Groups involved in drag & drop
        Returns:
        String[]
        Default:
        "media"

      • tab

        public abstract boolean tab
        Indication of whether the HTML5 Smart Image Widget should be rendered as a stand alone tab.
        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        true

      • height

        public abstract int height
        Height of the SmartImage component. Note: You must explicitly specify height if you intend to render the HTML5 Smart Image Widget outside the context of its own tab.
        Returns:
        int
        Default:
        0

      • allowUpload

        public abstract boolean allowUpload
        Flag if uploading a file is allowed
        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        true

      • cropAspectRatios

        public abstract AspectRatio[] cropAspectRatios
        Crop Config Aspect Ratios
        Returns:
        AspectRatio[]
        Default:
        {}
